languages.text: "Вам понадобится сей оберег". {n}Фелек протягивает драгоценный камень, лишенный всякой оправы. Сияющий и ледяной на ощупь, сколько ни грей в руках.{/n} "И да прибудет с вами свет Бога-Императора!"

traits.locale_text: "Вам понадобится сей оберег". {n}Фелек протягивает драгоценный камень, лишенный всякой оправы. Сияющий и ледяной на ощупь, сколько ни грей в руках.{/n} "И да прибудет с вами свет Бога-Императора!"

languages.text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "And may the God-Emperor's light be with you!"
languages.original_text: "Вам понадобится сей оберег". {n}Фелек протягивает драгоценный камень, лишенный всякой оправы. Сияющий и ледяной на ощупь, сколько ни грей в руках.{/n} "И да прибудет с вами свет Бога-Императора!"

traits.locale_text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a frame of any kind. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in the palm of your hand.{/n} "And may the God-Emperor's light be with you!"

"You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a frame of any kind. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in the palm of your hand.{/n} "And may the God-Emperor's light be with you!"

"You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "And may the God-Emperor's light be with you!"

"You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "And may the God-Emperor's light be with you!"

"You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "And may the God-Emperor's light be with you!"

"You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "And may the God-Emperor's light be with you!"

languages.text: "Ihr werdet diesen Glücksbringer brauchen." {n}Felek überreicht dir einen Edelstein ohne Fassung. Seine glänzende Oberfläche bleibt kalt, so lange du ihn auch in der Hand hältst.{/n} "Und möge das Licht des Gottimperators mit Euch sein!"
languages.original_text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "And may the God-Emperor's light be with you!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet diesen Glücksbringer brauchen." {n}Felek überreicht dir einen Edelstein ohne Fassung. Seine glänzende Oberfläche bleibt kalt, so lange du ihn auch in der Hand hältst.{/n} "Und möge das Licht des Gottimperators mit Euch sein!"

languages.text: « Vous allez avoir besoin de cette amulette », {n}dit Felek en vous remettant une pierre précieuse sans monture. Sa surface lumineuse reste froide au toucher même si vous la tenez longtemps.{/n} « Puisse la lumière de l'Empereur-Dieu vous guider ! »
languages.original_text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "And may the God-Emperor's light be with you!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous allez avoir besoin de cette amulette », {n}dit Felek en vous remettant une pierre précieuse sans monture. Sa surface lumineuse reste froide au toucher même si vous la tenez longtemps.{/n} « Puisse la lumière de l'Empereur-Dieu vous guider ! »

languages.text: “您需要带上这件护身符。”{n}费雷克递给了你一块没有任何装饰的贵重宝石。哪怕你一直把它握在手里，它闪闪发光的表面都没有任何温度。{/n}“愿神皇之光与您同在。”
languages.original_text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "And may the God-Emperor's light be with you!"

traits.locale_text: “您需要带上这件护身符。”{n}费雷克递给了你一块没有任何装饰的贵重宝石。哪怕你一直把它握在手里，它闪闪发光的表面都没有任何温度。{/n}“愿神皇之光与您同在。”

languages.text: 「このお守りが必要になるだろう」{n}フェレックは装飾もない裸の宝石を手渡した。キラキラ輝くその表面は、どれほど手に持っていようと冷たいままだ。{/n}「神帝陛下の御光がともにあらんことを！」
languages.original_text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "And may the God-Emperor's light be with you!"

traits.locale_text: 「このお守りが必要になるだろう」{n}フェレックは装飾もない裸の宝石を手渡した。キラキラ輝くその表面は、どれほど手で触れていても冷たさは失われない。{/n}「神帝陛下の御光が共にあらんことを！」
「このお守りが必要になるだろう」{n}フェレックは装飾もない裸の宝石を手渡した。キラキラ輝くその表面は、どれほど手に持っていようと冷たいままだ。{/n}「神帝陛下の御光がともにあらんことを！」

languages.text: «Necesitará este amuleto». {n}Felek te entrega una piedra preciosa sin engastar. Su superficie, luminosa, permanece fría por mucho que la sujetes en la mano.{/n} «¡Y que la luz del Dios Emperador le guíe!».
languages.original_text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "And may the God-Emperor's light be with you!"

traits.locale_text: «Necesitará este amuleto». {n}Felek te entrega una piedra preciosa sin engastar. Su superficie, luminosa, permanece fría por mucho que la sujetes en la mano.{/n} «¡Y que la luz del Dios Emperador le guíe!».

languages.text: "Al bakayım şu tılsımı." {n}Felek, sana yuvasız bir mücevher veriyor. Işıltılı yüzeyi, elinde ne kadar tutarsan tut ısınmıyor.{/n} "Tanrı İmparator'un ışığı, yoluna yoldaş olsun!"
languages.original_text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "And may the God-Emperor's light be with you!"

traits.locale_text: "Al bakayım şu tılsımı." {n}Felek, sana yuvasız bir mücevher veriyor. Işıltılı yüzeyi, elinde ne kadar tutarsan tut ısınmıyor.{/n} "Tanrı İmparator'un ışığı, yoluna yoldaş olsun!"
